column4: i reset my compiz and gnome, now alt+tab is not working :( any help
i reset my compiz and gnome, now alt+tab is not working :( any help
speaking of upgrading bios. Do you know how I can upgrade bios for my hp envy 17 without a windows environment?
never exp on hp. got to check their specific site for bios upgrade
yeah it says windows required. I tried a few things to know avail. Thanks anyways
then install windows, upgrade bios then install ubuntu
I don't want to loose my ubuntu install I got going. Doesn't windows want the whole hd.
nothing, just goahead and do it. it's always better to have your bios upgraded once in 2 years
so you are saying I can install windows without blowing up my ubuntu install?
yes, you will just blowup the boot config file, that you can reset it later
awesome I will work on that. Thanks
before doing so, just keep the solution ready to recover your grub....
I can do that from a ubuntu live usb right?
guess so. be prepared with all the situation..
Thanks
you won't loose anything other than grub, and depends on your FS/ Drive Structure... So i have no idea how is yours, need to understand your situation and you are the best person to judge that
conclusion is can be done.
Yeah I will take all that into consideration.
do you know if I could make or get a windows live cd and upgrade my bios from that?
sorry, no idea
i don't think windows gives you that kind of option like ubuntu, check out the new 7 and 8. if you have any with you.
